about_the_game:
Want ACTION? DRAMA? Even FAST FOOD? You're definitely in the right place. Join the rising action hero Fernan and his buddies as they venture on a dangerous and fun-filled adventure to save the taste buds of humanity.




The villainous Giga Boy runs a chowder shop that is suffering a drop in sales. On a quest to renown his product of disgust, he sets his sails to attack another, much more acclaimed food item, known as the hamburger. As this task is far too difficult on a manual scale, Giga Boy grabs the “hyper-rocks”, a viable energy source, to power the machine that will turn burgers into history!! But fortunately, they split into shards, scattering them across the world. Meanwhile, Fernan, a known burger enthusiast living on the edge of a great city, catches whiff of these horrible plans. He grabs his closest friends, and they venture forth to stop the rise of Giga Boy’s product. But it may be harder than they previously thought…




Inspired by the rise of 90s TV shows and platformers that aim to revive this unique style, Chaotic Conundrum is a 2D platformer all about going fast with difficulty that will make you look before you leap. But there's a twist to the tradition! At the end of the stage, your player FLIPS OUT, and you’ve gotta book it back to the start point before you're toast. Think you can master all the episodes and get the highest ranks?!




That's not all, though! There are myriads of marvelous mechanics to mess around with in each and every level! Burst into the background of a stage, swing from slippery vines, freeze into solid ice and bounce around recklessly, turn into a soda cup to destroy acid walls and much more! Every single stage has something new for you to enjoy.




- Dozens of Burgers to collect!
- Tackle the game's crazy levels as one of three playable characters, each with their own stats and abilities!
- Voice-Acted Cutscenes!
- Cosmetic Unlockables! No micro transactions, simply play to unlock!
- Achievements to keep you coming back for more!
- Tough-as-nails bosses!
- buttery smooth hand drawn pixel animation!
- Creative and outlandish worlds to explore!
- Controller support for a smoother experience!
- Turn up the heat with the difficult and nail-biting spicy mode!

Please keep in mind that this game is still in active development. As such, all assets, level designs, and gameplay components are not final and subject to change.
